patthana18.29:1.1: Saraṇaṁ dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana18.29:2.1: Araṇaṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naaraṇo nanadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana18.29:3.1: Araṇaṁ sauttaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasaraṇo nasauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana18.29:4.1: Araṇaṁ anuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
